Class ReadoutLearningRLS

  • java.lang.Object
    • Readout
      • ReadoutLearningRLS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streams.Feedback

    public class ReadoutLearningRLS
extends Readout
implements Streams.Feedback
    Implements a set of M readout/feedback units that interact with a reservoir of size N rate-model neurons. Unit responses are weighted sum (no nonlinearity). Connection weights to the units are optionally sparse (parameter p_z) and drawn from a normal distribution; they are represented by a 2D dense matrix (Colt library) and scaled by 1/sqrt(N*p_z) (Sussillo & Abbott 2009, p. 556). Feedback weights are optionally sparse (parameter p) and drawn from a uniform distribution; they are represented by a 2D dense matrix and scaled by g (Sussillo & Abbott 2009, p. 556).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadoutLearningRLS

        public ReadoutLearningRLS(Streams.InputStream target,
                  int N,
                  double p,
                  double p_z,
                  double g,
                  double alpha)
        Initialize a feedback/readout set of M neurons that feed back on N network units.
        Parameters:
        target - the target readout
        N - the number of feedbacks
        p - the probability of a feedback connection (sparsity parameter)
        p_z - the probability of a readout connection (sparsity parameter)
        g - weighting factor for gaussian FEEDBACK connectivity (output scaled to 1)
        alpha - the learning rate
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if N or M is less than one
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if p is not between 0 and 1
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if g is infinite or NaN

      • ReadoutLearningRLS

        public ReadoutLearningRLS(Streams.InputStream target,
                  int N,
                  double alpha)
        Initialize a network with default parameters: p = 1.0; p_z = 1.0; g = 1.0
